Posts.Content: Nausea is a common side effect of radiotherapy if the treatment area hits your stomach and/or  liver.  I had it bad the last week of RT and still have it three weeks after finishing-it was awful yesterday!  Lots of ginger will help
Posts.Title: Sickness after radiotheraphy

Posts.Content: You could still be getting nauseous from the RT as i still get nauseous two weeks after finishing RT mostly without tamoxifen.  I tried taking it before the RT started, stopped as felt so tired and have recently started again a few days ago but was nauseous before starting it (though it may have made it slightly worse).   X
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen & nausea?

Posts.Content: To be fair my nausea has definitely got worse this last week so the tamoxifen is probably adding to it.  I tried taking it at night when first started and just found it kept me awake all night so switched to mornings.  That and the exhaustion not sure if tamoxifen worth it for me as had a pretty well behaved tumour! Hope it all works out for you X
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen & nausea?
